search.name: DQSD Mail Archive
search.description:
Search the mail archives for Dave's QuickSearch Deskbar (DQSD). The search engine only seems to work for single words. To get results, limit your search to a single word. Searches the users mail archive, by default.
Switches:
dqsd search-word [/users|/devel/announce]
/users - Users mailing list
/developers - Developers mailing list
/announcements - Annoucements
Examples:
dqsd .xml
dqsd froogle
dqsd bug /announce
dqsd args /devel
